alert.note: Alert for Cross; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:31PM CDT until June 11 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern St. Francis County in eastern Arkansas... Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 731 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fair Oaks, or 11 miles west of Wynne, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Wynne, Parkin, Madison, Village Creek State Park, Caldwell, Colt, Widener, Fair Oaks, Vanndale, New Home, Smithdale, Hydrick, Cottonwood Corner, Fitzgerald Crossing, New Castle, McDonald, Brushy Lake, Round Pond and McElroy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
